title: The Importance of Being Mindful: A Lesson in Personal Safety
story: Look at that guy, Donald. What guy, Dorothy? The one with his head down. He is looking at his cell phone. I know, but he didn't see that car. What car? A car almost hit him. Wow. We should always pay attention.
summary: This story highlights the importance of being mindful and paying attention to our surroundings for personal safety.
image: An image of a person walking with their head down, engrossed in their cell phone, oblivious to the car passing by.
